credential-alert.approved-subtitle: Thank you for submitting your request. To check its status, please click here:
credential-alert.processing-subtitle: Please keep this app open as it may take up to 30 seconds. If nothing happens after 30 seconds, completely exit and restart the app.

credential-subtitle: Verify once, access multiple services instantly. You control what personal information is shared, ensuring your privacy remains protected. Complete the simple process in just 60 seconds.

credential-shared.title: Credential Shared!
